content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to internal company information, so I am unable to predict what Reebok's next big thing will be. However, Reebok is known for its innovation and commitment to incorporating new technologies and materials into its products. The brand has also shown interest in sustainability and ethical manufacturing practices, so it's possible that we may see more eco-friendly initiatives from Reebok in the future. Additionally, Reebok has always been focused on creating apparel and footwear that is both functional and stylish, so we can expect that any new releases will continue to emphasize this combination.
